name: Clipboard Paster
description: Paste images (e.g. screenshots) directly from the clipboard to an upload field, and more.

project-settings.name:
Welcome to the Clipboard Paster

The Clipboard Paster adds the following features to REDCap:

  1. Images stored in the clipboard (e.g. screenshots) may be pasted into file upload fields designated as @INLINE.
  2. Double-clicking on an inline image will open it into a new window or tab, sized to the underlying dimensions if the image.
  3. Inline images may optionally be displayed in full-width containers placed just below the form fields.
  4. Notes fields may optionally be reformatted to full-with, resizeable input controls.
